Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its immense worth to you, we are offering it at an exclusive price of $1,350,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing the return on our investment and ensuring that you receive exceptional value for your business. We are confident that this product will be a game-changer for you and look forward to discussing how it can be seamlessly integrated into your operations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our proposal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
